item.title: Transfer Guide at Tianhe Airport: Speedy Visit to the Yellow Crane Tower (6h)
item.author: 滑翔闪
item.description: GPT Summary This travelogue succinctly summarizes the experience of transferring at Wuhan Airport. It covers enjoying transfer services in advance, taking the subway to quickly visit the Yellow Crane Tower, returning to the airport to handle boarding procedures, and summarizing how to complete the visit within 5 hours.
